TopicTitle: Why did the deva decide to add Minmus?

Articles.Content:
Do you think there is a reason, for which devs decided to add Minmus? It definitíy does not seem as a random decision.

Excited to hear your thoughts!

ALSO, sorry for the typo in the name

Edited December 28, 2023 by ItanMark
Typo
Minmus was added as a second destination to visit before going interplanetary.
Oh yeah! Don’t know how didn’t think about this myself!

Minmus is easier to get to and successfully land than the Mun.

Easier to teach/understand precision landing.

But to Kerbals it just is tastier than the Mun.

 

ME
From a gameplay perspective, good reasons above. One can also simulate an interplanetary transfer between the mun and minmus.

Before compiling, the computer asked the dev, "Do you want to add another moon?" with a Yes/No dropdown menu.

Just as the dev was about to click "No" an ad popped up on the top and dropped the whole page down so the dev accidentally clicked "Yes", instead!

The rest, as they say, is history!

 

You can trust me. You don't have to Google it, or anything...
